restaurants.name: Pane & Vino
restaurants.description: Pane & Vino is a top-rated Italian restaurant in Miami Beach, boasting fresh homemade pasta, attentive service, tiramisu, vegetarian and gluten-free options, and friendly atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Mon Ami Gabi
restaurants.description: Mon Ami Gabi is a popular French bistro-style eatery on the Las Vegas strip for its brunch and dinner.
restaurants.address: 3655 Las Vegas Blvd S Paris Las Vegas, Las Vegas, NV 89109-4345

restaurants.name: Hog Island Oyster Company
restaurants.description: Hog Island Oyster Company is a must-try restaurant in San Francisco that serves fresh oysters in a variety of styles and is located near the Golden Gate ferry port.
restaurants.address: Ferry Building, One, #11, San Francisco, CA 94111

restaurants.name: Phil’s BBQ
restaurants.description: Phil's BBQ is a popular San Diego BBQ spot with pleasant employees and speedy service. Customers are raving about the food's quality and quantity size. The always-busy local establishment is packed with folks eager to try their ribs, onion rings, brisket, and other offerings. Even if there is a wait for a table, staff is kind and the service is prompt.
restaurants.address: 3750 Sports Arena Blvd, San Diego, CA 92110-5129

restaurants.name: Spice Symphony
restaurants.description: Spice Symphony is a casual dining Indian restaurant in New York City, known for its Indian staples like samosas and garlic naan, as well as a broad wine list.
restaurants.address: 150 E 50th St Between Lexington & 3rd Avenue, New York City, NY 10022-9500
restaurants.openinghours: Mon - Thu,Sun 7:00 AM - 10:15 PM; Fri - Sat 7:00 AM - 11:30 PM

restaurants.name: Duke’s Waikiki
restaurants.description: Duke's Waikiki is Hawaii's most legendary dessert restaurant, offering Oreo-crusted Hula Pie and other delicious dishes.
restaurants.address: 2335 Kalakaua Ave 2335 Kalakaua Ave. Suite 116, Honolulu, Oahu, HI 96815-2941
